attributes.action: give British jobs back to British workers..NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is still several million foreign workers holding jobs here at a time when we have over 2 million unemployed British workers.
We can't get the jobs while foreigners still have them.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
